subject: Football
Gambling
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: One sports betting Web site was refunding wagers on the Packers, who appeared to be robbed of a win last night against the Seahawks by a ruling from replacement officials.
snippet: One sports betting Web site was refunding wagers on the Packers, who appeared to be robbed of a win last night against the Seahawks by a ruling from replacement officials.
